mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Randolph's favor of 7th first information he had of vacancy in post office at Richmond; great number of applications he had when president obliged him never to take part in any solicitations; will, however, mention Randolph's case to Mr. President.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1818 July 21, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to Brett Randolph, n.p.
